titleStmt.title: Mill'd lead, demonstrated to be a better and more durable covering for buildings, &c. and above 20 per cent. cheaper than cast-lead can be ... and also for sheathing ships against the worm, better, and above cent. per cent. cheaper than the ordinariest wood-sheathing can be.
titleStmt.author: T. H. (Thomas Hale)
